title: Understanding Recovery
text: Recovery in mental health is not just about the absence of symptoms. It involves a holistic approach to improving one's life.

title: Key Aspects of Recovery
text: Consider the aspects of health, wellness, self-direction, and potential. How do these relate to the concept of recovery?

hintAnswer: a process of change through which individuals improve their health and wellness, live a $$self-directed$$ life, and strive to reach their full potential
title: Defining Recovery
text: What is the definition of recovery in the context of mental health?
choices: a process of change through which individuals improve their health and wellness, live a $$self-directed$$ life, and strive to reach their full potential
